comment: Schroder (ATL) makes incidental contact with Smith (DET) that does not affect his SQBR. 01:46.1 01:46.1
Smith (DET) places a hand on Schroder's (ATL) back during his drive, but does not extend his arm or affect his drive to the basket.
Smith (DET) makes contact to Dedmon's (ATL) arm during his shot attempt near the rim. 01:34.1 01:34.1
Griffin (DET) sets the screen on Schroder (ATL) and gives him room to avoid the contact.
Schroder (ATL) legally contests Nelson's (DET) jump shot attempt. 01:17.1 01:17.1
Dedmon (ATL) sets the screen on Ennis III (DET) and gives him room to avoid the contact.
Dedmon (ATL) sets the screen on Bullock (DET) and gives him room to avoid the contact. 00:56.1 00:56.1
Drummond (DET) establishes himself in Schroder's (ATL) path with a wide stance and contact occurs to his leg/thigh area.
Dedmon (ATL) legally contest Drummond's (DET) shot attempt.
Bullock (DET) sets the screen on Ilyasova (ATL) and gives him room to avoid the contact.
Ilyasova (ATL) engages with Griffin (DET) but does not affect his ability to get to the pass.
Drummond (DET) is in Bazemore's (ATL) path before the contact and is firming up when it occurs.
After communicating with the Replay Center, the ruling on the court, possession awarded to the Pistons, was upheld. Period 00:40.8 00:40.8
Ilyasova (ATL) sets the screen on Bullock (DET) and gives him room to avoid the contact.
Bullock (DET) initiates contact with Schroder's (ATL) body while he is in the air during his shooting motion.
After communicating with the Replay Center, the ruling on the court, possession awarded to the Hawks, was upheld
Griffin (DET) and Schroder (ATL) collide after the whistle. Dead ball contact can result in a technical or flagrant foul, neither of which is warranted in this situation.
Drummond (DET) commits a take foul on Schroder (ATL). 00:19.6 00:19.6
Ilyasova (ATL) maintains legal guarding position and makes incidental contact with Griffin (DET) that does not affect his drive to the basket and shot attempt. 00:16.4 00:16.4
Nelson (DET) maintains a legal guarding position while defending Schroder (ATL).
Griffin (DET) commits a take foul on Schroder (ATL).
Drummond (DET) is in Dorsey's (ATL) path before contact occurs. He maintains his position and doesn't deliver contact. 00:09.3 00:09.3
Dorsey (ATL) legally contests Tolliver (DET) jump shot attempt. Any "high-five" contact after the release is considered incidental.
Nelson (DET) commits a take foul on Schroder (ATL). Event Assessments: CC = Correct Call, IC = Incorrect Call, CNC = Correct Non-Call, INC = Incorrect Non-Call
